Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o19 pages, 20 figures. Revised version makes two corrections: The statement of the old Lemma 14 was incorrect. It has been corrected and merged with Lemma 13 now. Second, Figure 19 (a skew quadrilateral) wasincorrect,
and is now removed. It played no substantive role in the proofs\u00a7r
